steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(9), 2), increase(2)),
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(1), number_in_box(2), put_result_into_box(7)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(2), 1), number_in_box(5)), then_go_to_step(8), then_go_to_step(4)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(2), 1), increase(2)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(2), 2), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(3), then_go_to_step(6)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(2), 1), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(9), 1), number_in_box(4)), then_go_to_step(1), then_go_to_step(1)),
Put(number_in_box(3), into_box(2)),
Put(number_in_box(1), into_box(1)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 7?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在7号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Change Instruction 9: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 2
Multiply: ( number in box 1 ) * ( number in box 2 ), put result into box 7.
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 2 greater than ( number in box 5 )
Change Instruction 2: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 2
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 2 greater than ( number in box 6 )
Change Instruction 2: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 9 greater than ( number in box 4 )
Put ( number in box 3 ) into box 2
Put ( number in box 1 ) into box 1
desc_zh: 更改指令9：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加2
相乘：1号盒子中的数字*2号盒子中的数字，将结果放在7号盒子中。
判断：指令2中第1个盒子的编号比5号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令2：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加2
判断：指令2中第2个盒子的编号比6号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令2：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令9中第1个盒子的编号比4号盒子中的数字大吗
将3号盒子中的数字放在2号盒子中
将1号盒子中的数字放在1号盒子中
